 2024-09762024-08-28PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of WILLIAM ROBERT YOUNG of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of History, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
